name: Fault in our stars.
description:
Go around in the town speaking to beautiful ladies and asking few out. If you've asked a wrong girl out you loose a heart but a correct girl gives you a SMOOCH!

You'll be assigned a random zodiac at the start of the game, you have to try to find a girl whose zodiac sign is compatible with yours. Each girl you talk to will tell a story, some clues will be provided before hand such as strengths and weaknesses of the love compatible zodiac signs of yours, with help of the clues and the story try to find a compatible girl. 2 points makes you a winner!

Controls:
  • WASD  -  Move.
  • E - talk.
Handcrafted by -
Alex & Kaushal.
